name: Sugar Combo
description:
Pile up sugar cubes to make the sweetest coffee! ❤️

Drop the cubes with left-click and complete the sugary combo objectives! How many rounds will you complete? How perfect will your positioning be? Can you keep up?

Play in full screen for a better experience!

This was my first solo game jam, hope you enjoy :)



Outside Assets Used:

- Farland Skies Cloudy Crown Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cloudy-crown-60004
- Creative Commons 0 SFX (all of them edited for the game): https://freesound.org/ 
- Font: https://www.dafont.com/es/small-print.font?l[]=10&l[]=1&text=coffee

- Game Music:
Gentle Lo-Fi Vlog Background Music | Cookies by Alex-Productions | https://onsound.eu/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
- Main Menu Music: 
Sunset Landscape by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
